full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Notice: Overhead Hoists**
---------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4087610654-Doc4087655928

**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4087610654
**Publication Date:** July 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 22, 2023 2:00 pm EDT (pre-modification)

**Amendment Date:** August 14, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** September 24, 2026

**Classification:**

* UNSPC code: 24101602
* UNSPC description: Hoists

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RISO)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Required Services:**

The Department of National Defence, 4 Wing Cold Lake AB, requires a contractor to provide labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for inspecting, repairing, supplying, delivering, maintaining, cleaning, and replacing Overhead Hoists. The proposed standing offer is for a period of three years, with two optional one-year extensions.

**Closing Instructions:**

Please disregard the original closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by August 15, 2023, at 2:00 pm EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

Willy Zumbado Diaz
SPAC/PSPC
willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

* I used proper formatting to make the text easily readable
